    • Method Detail

      • render2D

        public abstract javafx.scene.layout.Pane render2D​(Render2DType renderType)
                                           throws ModelRendererException,
                                                  FileReaderException
        Render2D provides a Pane object containing a 2D representation of the requested render type.
        Parameters:
        renderType - The type of render.
        Returns:
        A Pane object representing the object to be rendered.
        Throws:
        ModelRendererException - This method can throw a converter exception if an error occured during the rendering.
        FileReaderException - This method can throw a file reader exception if an error occured during the reading of the file.

      • render3D

        public abstract PolygonMesh render3D​(Render3DType renderType,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​M2> cache)
                              throws ModelRendererException,
                                     MPQException,
                                     FileReaderException
        Render3D provides a PolygonMesh object containing a 3D representation of the requested render type.
        Parameters:
        renderType - The render type that needs to be used when generating this polygon mesh.
        cache - A cache of models, in case of generation of mesh with a lot of models, this helps to speed up the mesh generation process.
        Returns:
        A PolygonMesh object representing the object to be rendered.
        Throws:
        ModelRendererException - This method can throw a converter exception if an error occured during the rendering.
        MPQException - This method can throw a MPQ exception if a file to be extracted from the MPQ doesn't exist in the MPQ libraries.
        FileReaderException - This method can throw a File Reader Exception if an extracted file is malformed.

      • save2D

        public boolean save2D​(java.lang.String path,
                      FileType2D fileType,
                      Render2DType renderType)
               throws ModelRendererException,
                      FileReaderException
        Save2D saves an image of a rendered object using the method render2D.
        Parameters:
        path - The path where the file needs to be stored.
        fileType - The file type extension to be saved.
        renderType - The render type.
        Returns:
        True if the file has been saved, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ModelRendererException - This method throws a converter exception if an error occured during the rendering.
        FileReaderException - This method throws a file reader exception if an error occured during the reading of the file.

      • save3D

        public boolean save3D​(java.lang.String path,
                      FileType3D fileType,
                      Render3DType renderType,
                      boolean addNormals,
                      boolean addTextures)
               throws ModelRendererException,
                      MPQException,
                      FileReaderException
        Save3D saves an image of a rendered object using the method render3D.
        Parameters:
        path - The path where the file needs to be stored.
        fileType - The file type extension to be saved.
        renderType - The render type to be used.
        addNormals - Indicates whether normals information must be added
        addTextures - Indicates whether texture informations must be added to the saved file.
        Returns:
        True if the file has been saved, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ModelRendererException - This method can throw a converter exception in case of some conversion went wront.
        MPQException - MPQ Exception can be raised in case there's an error to find the requested file.
        FileReaderException - File Reader exception can be raised in case there's an error while reading the requested file.

      • getAngleAndAxis

        protected javafx.scene.transform.Rotate getAngleAndAxis​(Quaternion q)

      • getAngleAndPivot

        protected javafx.scene.transform.Rotate getAngleAndPivot​(double attitude,
                                                         double heading,
                                                         double bank)
        Provides a rotation object matching the Euler angles provided for rotation. This method assumes that the provided information are in degrees. Tip: WoW rotation for Euler angle is YXZ. ZXY. -- XZY
        Parameters:
        attitude - The first rotation angle.
        heading - The second rotation angle.
        bank - The last rotation angle.
        Returns:
        A Rotate object with Axis and Rotation angle around that axis.
